alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 25 at 10:57PM PST until February 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Moderate snow and icy road conditions expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches possible in the San Gabriel mountains. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Potential for road closures, including Interstate 5 near the Grapevine. Some mountain roadways may be impassable for an extended period of time.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
